hooks.name: format-on-save
hooks.description: Auto-format files after Claude edits them

hooks.name: verify-on-stop
hooks.description: Run verification when Claude completes a task
hooks.command: echo 'Task complete. Running verification...' && npm test 2>/dev/null || pytest 2>/dev/null || echo 'No tests found'

hooks.name: notify-complete
hooks.description: System notification when long task completes
hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code task complete" with title "Claude"' 2>/dev/null || true
